d:
Hello its me again (I remember the password to this account)!!
Anyways I'm probably translate these while I do grad school stuff, they're super short and actually allow me to use my major for something. I may also start doing actual literature since I have some short stories that could be translated so if you guys wanna not jerk off and read then that's an option lol.
n: [Doujinshi] A Story about how Pyra Fell in Love with a Playboy and Found her Elysium
